snippet: The Chronicle's editor posted a note to readers saying that Naomi Schaefer Riley's commentary "did not meet The Chronicle's basic editorial standards for reporting and fairness in opinion articles."
abstract: The Chronicle's editor posted a note to readers saying that Naomi Schaefer Riley's commentary "did not meet The Chronicle's basic editorial standards for reporting and fairness in opinion articles."

headline.main: Chronicle of Higher Education Fires Blogger Over Black Studies Post
